Articles.Content:
I've been fooling around with Space Engine for the last few weeks, and just ran into this video again.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3qCTQY3YOOg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I might have the time and inclination over the next month(s) to either play around in Lightwave to make a KSP version of this, or, failing that, make a Space Engine cinematic of it using the KSP system someone made for it (I can't find the link).

Thoughts?

> 
> I've been fooling around with Space Engine for the last few weeks, and just ran into this video again.
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3qCTQY3YOOg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
> 
> I might have the time and inclination over the next month(s) to either play around in Lightwave to make a KSP version of this, or, failing that, make a Space Engine cinematic of it using the KSP system someone made for it (I can't find the link).
> 
> Thoughts?

You could probably use OPM and Kirius to do this.
I would love to see something like that!
